divs: Sighting Details I sighted this UFO in 1995. At the time I was fixing cattle fence for a ranch near Livermore, Colorado,..close to the Forks Restaurant. I first notice the craft as I stood-up to take a drink of water from a canteen. The craft was a clasic cigar shaped craft, and was SO large that it was hard to miss when I looked up to take a drink of water. At first I thought I was seeing the GoodYear blimp;.. as there is a blimp hangar only a few miles from where I was at the tme. But upon closer inspection of the surrounding background,.. I quickly realized that the craft was much, MUCH, larger than the GoodYear blimp! The craft hovered silently, about 200 feet off the ground for a few minutes, and then slowly moved over the mountains to the West. At first I did not beleive what I was seeing, but soon realized that I was with-out a doubt looking at a cigar shaped UFO! When I looked back up at the Forks restaurant to see if anyone else was seeing what I was seeing,.. I was supprised to see that there was about a half dozen other people standing on the front pourch of the Forks restaurant who were all pointing at the same thing..!!! Sadly,.. after a few minutes;.. the craft floated over the mountains to the South-West of Livermore and left our field of view. Although I witnessed the sighting of this UFO over a decade ago;.. I still have vivid memories and even dreams of that event. It was an event that changed my life..!!! Since that time, I have only told a few people about the event. When I DO mention the event to someone;.. I usually get the classic looks and scarcastic coments, etc. So I finally stopped telling anyone about my sighting. But was a few moments that are burned into my memory, that has changed my life, in a big, BIG way..!!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Livermore
This sighting has never been favorited.
